name: Y.O.L.K - A Stealthy Egg Laying Game
name_original: Y.O.L.K - A Stealthy Egg Laying Game
description:
Y.O.L.K is A Stealth focused Oviposition game where you play as a sneaky Avian that has to lay eggs in strategic locations while avoiding the patrolling Guards. No one knows why they do what they do but they have gained a following nonetheless.
 -Highly recommend that you play the [First Timers] mission first.

--Controls--
WASD - Move
Mouse Movement - Look around with camera
Left Shift - Match speed

E - Switch between egg and move modes.
Left Click [While in egg mode] - to push.

Made for Strawberry Jam 6! I remember reading some early discussion in the month about the jam being open to more "loose" definitions of what could be considered. So I thought literally about the concept of being "stealthy".
Additional Thanks to:
Lake Wobegon NF - Nicks Font
Code Help - Brackeys / Sebastian League
